page.title: 06BOXFORD CHURCH Cont.
page.content:
The most popular service is Christmas time and Christmas midnight communion.
Dr. Toon is the priest. If someone is sick, Dr. Toon goes to visit them at their home and if there are marriages, burials or christenings, Dr. Toon goes to visit the family before the service. 275 copies of the Parish Magazine are printed each month.
There are about twenty ladies helping with flower arrangements. In the Church Choir there are twenty-five children if they all turn up. If some are not there, there are about fifteen children. On Christmas days or something like that, there are all of the Choir there. The organ is old because it has a pump to push to blow the organ. Mr. Potts plays the organ but when he is away Mr. Lowe plays it.
